name: Loli Bubble Arena
description:
A game made by my team during the 2018 CGJ.  This is a light-hearted, two player action game in which players go against each other and try to defeat the opponent. 

Each player has a endzone with changing color, and players lose health if a ball of matching color touches the endzone. 

Each player gets a "magazine" of randomly generated balls with the three primary color(red, yellow, blue). When two primary ball touches, they fuse into a new ball with the mixed color(red + yellow = orange, etc.). 

This game is built around the theme of fusion, and we formed the ball fusing mechanics based on this theme.
